description.value:
Years of your past have been dedicated to the pursuit of knowledge, whether it be a specific subject or a need for information in general. Regardless of what knowledge you were searching for, or studying, you have spent quite a while working in pursuit and study of it. You are more studious, well read, and have a knack for research and uncommon bits of knowledge to impress others with.

Skill Proficiency: Pick one of the following: Arcana, Craft, Investigation, Medicine, Theology, or Culture.

Other Proficiency: Gain either a trade proficiency or the ability to speak, read, and write two additional languages.

Background Feature: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.CEDNUQ4BN37WPXPH]{Prepared}

Equipment: A book on a subject of your choice.
